Loopnet Insights
The #1 Loopnet extension
The #1 Multifamily Real Estate Extension

Over 3,000 real estate multifamily owners and property management firms use Deal Reports because we verify and curate multifamily real estate data derived from the largest online marketplace for multifamily properties, Loopnet.com. Our multifamily research team scours the multifamily market, identifying communities of all types and sizes, providing over 400 million data points - allowing users to present the most accurate, timely rents for any community.

Deal Reports provides property buyers the essentials to succeed in all aspects of the multifamily industry - including tools such as rent comps, occupancy data, and concessions. Whether looking to acquire new communities, or find great deals, Deal Report puts you in a position to move your business forward.

- Search for listings based on star rating, performance, rents, or any other investment criteria.

- Generate market and submarket reports to find market areas that may be investment-worthy.

- Generate comp sets for any community using information about similar communities viewed by Loopnet.com users.

- Forecast rents to determine the best exit strategy behind any asset.
